name: schedule_qa_deployment
description: Schedule periodic QA deployment automation for a GitLab project. This tool creates a background task that periodically checks if the latest pipeline's 'build' job has completed successfully, and if so, automatically triggers the 'deploy-qa' job.

project_id.description: The GitLab project ID or URL-encoded path (e.g., 'mygroup/myproject' or '12345'). This identifies which project's pipeline to monitor for automated QA deployment.

message.description: A message describing the result of the scheduling operation

project_id.description: The project ID that was scheduled for monitoring
